title: Restore original hero product photo on landing page

requirements.summary: Revert landing page hero image to the previously user-provided generated asset by updating the centralized HERO_IMAGE_SRC constant, ensuring the Hero section continues to render via that constant with no broken image links.
acceptanceCriteria: HERO_IMAGE_SRC in frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts no longer points to /assets/generated/product-hero-v2.dim_1600x1200.png and instead points to the user-provided image filename that exists under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The Hero section image renders correctly on the landing page (no 404/missing image) and continues to use the centralized HERO_IMAGE_SRC constant (no hardcoded image path added to the component).
No other landing page content, layout, or theme styling changes as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Update HERO_IMAGE_SRC to point to the previously user-provided static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated (use the existing generated filename, e.g., /assets/generated/product-hero.dim_1600x1200.png, instead of the current v2 image), keeping the constant as the single source of truth so the Hero section continues to render without broken links.
